tool_description: Creates, manages, and evaluates alert rules for shipment monitoring based on customizable conditions like delays, location deviations, and status changes.

rule_name.description: Unique name for the alert rule

shipment_filters.description: Shipment IDs or patterns this rule applies to

condition_type.description: Type of condition: delay, location_deviation, status_change, customs_hold, temperature

threshold_unit.description: Unit for threshold: hours, kilometers, degrees, percentage

alert_severity.description: Alert severity level: low, medium, high, critical

notification_channels.description: Channels for alerts: email, sms, webhook, dashboard

suppress_duplicates.description: Whether to suppress duplicate alerts within timeframe

auto_resolve.description: Whether to auto-resolve alerts when conditions normalize

active.description: Whether this rule is currently active

error_messages: Invalid condition type: Use one of: delay, location_deviation, status_change, customs_hold, temperature.
Threshold unit mismatch: Ensure threshold_unit is compatible with condition_type (e.g., hours for delay).
Invalid severity level: Use one of: low, medium, high, critical.
Unsupported notification channel: Use supported channels: email, sms, webhook, dashboard.
Suppression window out of range: Must be between 1 and 72 hours.
Escalation delay out of range: Must be between 1 and 168 hours.
Duplicate rule name: A rule with this name already exists. Use a unique rule_name.
Too many shipment filters: Maximum 100 shipment patterns allowed per rule.
usage: Provide rule_name, shipment_filters array, condition_type, threshold_value, and threshold_unit. Optionally configure alert_severity, notification_channels, and timing parameters for suppression and escalation.

rule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created rule

rule_status.description: Status of rule creation or update

matching_shipments.description: Number of current shipments matching the rule filters

estimated_alerts_per_day.description: Estimated daily alert volume based on historical data
